message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $12000. I'm willing to come down to $14000. What do you think?
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I was thinking of $13500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway at $14250. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $13750?
I'm not quite ready to give up yet, Bob! I'm willing to come down a bit more to $14000. What do you think?
